title: Supreme Court makes sports gambling legal, what it means (Football 05/14)
description:
Micah Roberts of Sportsline.com joins Will Brinson to break down the Supreme Court legalizing sports betting on this BONUS edition of the Pick Six Podcast. Can you bet on sports, um, right now? Where will it be legal? When will it be legal? Why are the NFL/MLB/NBA trying to get money from an integrity fee? What are the different ways in which states will handle this? Answers to all those questions plus much, much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
